channel.title: CVE Feed for wpeka-club -- Cookie Consent for WP – Cookie Consent, Consent Log, Cookie Scanner, Script Blocker (for GDPR, CCPA & ePrivacy)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpeka-club -- Cookie Consent for WP – Cookie Consent, Consent Log, Cookie Scanner, Script Blocker (for GDPR, CCPA & ePrivacy)

item.title: CVE-2024-4869|2024-08-01T20:55:10.255Z -- wpeka-club -- cookie%20consent%20for%20wp%20%E2%80%93%20cookie%20consent%2C%20consent%20log%2C%20cookie%20scanner%2C%20script%20blocker%20%28for%20gdpr%2C%20ccpa%20%26%20eprivacy%29
item.description: The WP Cookie Consent ( for GDPR, CCPA & ePrivacy ) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘Client-IP’ header in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4869|2024-06-26T17:52:09.276Z -- wpeka-club -- cookie%20consent%20for%20wp%20%E2%80%93%20cookie%20consent%2C%20consent%20log%2C%20cookie%20scanner%2C%20script%20blocker%20%28for%20gdpr%2C%20ccpa%20%26%20eprivacy%29
item.description: The WP Cookie Consent ( for GDPR, CCPA & ePrivacy ) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘Client-IP’ header in all versions up to, and including, 3.2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
